title: Living in a state where people can have a VR relationship with a 2d person makes me nervous at times
body:
[](http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-6hX2FngcmZk/U1VlHs5CfNI/AAAAAAAAQNI/yxSWLiV-z94/s1600/waifu.png)
I have no problem with people claiming waifus/husbandos or anything, and I lived in another state where a lot of people owned commissioned art of them and their 2d other, and that didn't even make me so nervous.

but something about seeing people that feel the need to live in an alternate universe to be with their 2d waifu/husbando makes me kind of uneasy.
not really sure why.

http://i.imgur.com/JNEYQFl.jpg
